about_the_game:
Moderns Vol. 1


Modernize your your game with Monster Grin's 110 unique tokens of modern day individuals, each usable as PCs, NPCs, mooks, antagonists, or protagonists!

Beautifully depicted characters artfully depict everything from homeboys to hipsters, gamer guys to gun-totin’ dudes, guys and girls alike - they’re all here waiting to add some 21st Century flavor to your game.

Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of what’s what and who’s who and bring your game up to date!

This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, full body, and silver):

  • Earring Guy
  • Gamer Guy
  • Glasses Guy
  • Hat Dude
  • Headphone Girl
  • Hipster Girl
  • Hipster Guy
  • Homeboy
  • Rifle guy
  • Tattoo Girl

Conversion by: James Holloway

Released on April 02, 2018. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.4 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

Moderns Vol. 1


Modernize your your game with Monster Grin's 110 unique tokens of modern day individuals, each usable as PCs, NPCs, mooks, antagonists, or protagonists!

Beautifully depicted characters artfully depict everything from homeboys to hipsters, gamer guys to gun-totin’ dudes, guys and girls alike - they’re all here waiting to add some 21st Century flavor to your game.

Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of what’s what and who’s who and bring your game up to date!

This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, full body, and silver):

  • Earring Guy
  • Gamer Guy
  • Glasses Guy

Conversion by: James Holloway

Released on April 02, 2018. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.4 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
